landscape.title: Welcome to Tarija
landscape.message: City of wine, dance and beautiful people

discover.title: What to Discover
discover.message: Experiences you might want to discover and enjoy

vendimia.title: Vendimia
vendimia.text: A festival that brings together art, music, dance, grapes and wines.

vino.title: Vino
vino.text: There are vineyards, industrial, artisanal wineries and wine bars.

explore.title: Explore The Wine Route
explore.message: There are vineyards, industrial and artisan wineries and wine bars that produce in addition to wines of all colors the famous national drink: the singani.
